enWisdom: One who seeks security remains steadfast [on the straight path]

Wisdom: مَنْ لَزِمَ الِاسْتِقَامَةَ لَمْ يَعْدَمِ السَّلَامَةَ
enWisdom: One who remains steadfast is not bereft of safety

Wisdom: مَنْ رَغِبَ فِي السَّلَامَةِ أَلْزَمَ نَفْسَهُ الِاسْتِقَامَةَ
enWisdom: One who wishes for security keeps himself steadfast on the straight path
There is no path that is nobler than steadfastness
There is no course more secure than steadfastness
